Texts.StoreApp:00001: Purchase date cannot be empty or in the future. Your Date is {PurchaseDate}
Texts.StoreApp:00002: A purchase must contain at least one item
Texts.StoreApp:00003: Purchase item quantity must be greater than zero
Texts.StoreApp:00004: Insufficient stock. Sale quantity exceeds available stock
Texts.StoreApp:00005: Stock not found for the selected product ({ProductName}) and warehouse ({WarehouseName})
Texts.StoreApp:00006: Purchase item unit price must be greater than 0
Texts.StoreApp:00007: Purchase item discount can not be negative
